attributes.action: To stop UK parliament from allowing a 2nd referendum
attributes.additional_details: The people spoke out loud to leave why put the hole country though it again it's only going to waist more money and people's time the petition to hold a 2nd referendum only has just over a one million when the people what voted out was millions it time for it to stop and get on with the brexit.
attributes.background: Stop parliament from allowing the 2nd referendum we voted and the UK brexit won no need to go though it all again the answer will be the same.
